critical_issues.title: Type Safety Gap in Index.ts Tool Arguments
critical_issues.why_it_matters: Type assertions bypass TypeScript's safety guarantees, potentially causing runtime errors
critical_issues.proposed_fix: Add runtime type guards or use validated types from validation utilities

critical_issues.title: Validation Logic Duplication Between Tools and Validation Module
critical_issues.why_it_matters: Duplicate validation logic creates maintenance burden and potential inconsistencies
critical_issues.proposed_fix: Remove inline validation in tasksTool.ts, use validation.ts functions consistently

major_issues.title: Inconsistent Error Handling in Index.ts vs Tools
major_issues.why_it_matters: Inconsistent error handling makes debugging difficult and creates unpredictable behavior
major_issues.proposed_fix: Use wrapToolError consistently across both index.ts and tool classes

major_issues.title: Missing Tool Method Input Validation Completeness
major_issues.why_it_matters: Incomplete validation allows invalid data to reach the API, potentially causing runtime errors
major_issues.proposed_fix: Add format validation for pagination cursors and other API-specific constraints

minor_issues.title: ISO Date Validation Logic Complexity
minor_issues.why_it_matters: Complex validation logic is hard to maintain and test comprehensively
minor_issues.proposed_fix: Simplify validation logic using single regex and Date.parse()

minor_issues.title: Test Helper Function Could Be More Descriptive
minor_issues.why_it_matters: Generic test helpers can mask important test details and make failures harder to debug
minor_issues.proposed_fix: Add more specific assertion helpers or inline assertions for critical validation tests
